title: Ironwood Club

Fashioned from the hard, unforgiving trunk of an oak, this club still retains the perfume of the forest.

Club Location & Where to Find

Location: Ruined Battlefield Mound ( X: 40 Y: 60 ). Dropped by:

Club Notes & Tips

Rarity: Uncommon Value: 600 Gp. Weight: 0.9 Kg. ID: ?? Despite not saying so in game, a druid using Shillelagh on this weapon will gain 1d4 Bludgeoning damage on every strike, on top of the 1d8 bludgeoning damage from Shillelagh itself, the +1 enchantment, as
